name: Grenade Quest
description:
Grenade Quest is a stealth game based only on grenades. The protagonist is a goblin rogue and the story is set in a sci-fi universe.

D'Jagger, the protagonist, has found out that some criminals who betrayed him want to steal something from a lab. He has decided to steal it first, but the lab is surveilled by many robots. He can destroy them or avoid them.

The layout of the levels and the behavior of the enemies enable three different approaches: full combat, full stealth and mixed.
